con:testCase.name: TC68733
con:testCase.con:description:
Test Case Name: Credit Card: Transfer from AF to account in advance.
Description: Transfer from a AF account to a credit card account that is in advance.
Expected Result: Transfer to credit card account must be successful and the correct transfer amount must be displayed on the credit card account.

con:configuration.file: O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/UsernamePassword.xlsx
O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/1.ProductInfo.xlsx

con:configuration.outfile: O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/1.ProductInfoResults.xlsx
O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/2.Repayment(Transfer)Results.xlsx
O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/3.PaymentPlanResults.xlsx
O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/4.Operations(Transfer)Results.xlsx

con:configuration.file: O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/JDBCConnectionString.xlsx

con:config.con:query: SELECT TOP 100 DBO.GETCIFWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(A.CUSTOMER_NO,8)) AS 'CUSTOMER', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(A.KEY_1,9)) AS 'AF ACCT', A.LOAN_BAL AS 'AF BAL', A.THEO_LOAN_BAL AS 'AF THEO BAL', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(B.KEY_1,9)) AS 'SAV ACCT', B.CURR_BAL AS 'SAV BAL', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(CC.KEY_1,9)) AS 'CC ACCT', CC.CURR_BAL AS 'CC BAL' FROM BORM A (NOLOCK) JOIN INVM B (NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO AND ACCT_TYPE = 0X30333030 AND CURR_STATUS = 0X3030 LEFT JOIN INVM CC (NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = CC.CUSTOMER_NO AND CC.ACCT_TYPE = 0X30313031 AND CC.CURR_STATUS = 0X3030 WHERE A.ACT_TYPE = 0X36303030 -- ACCESS FACILITY ACCOUNT TYPE 6000 AND STAT = 0X3038 --08 OPEN STATUS AND RIGHT(A.KEY_1,9) = :fromAccount AND A.KEY_1 > 0X30303330303030303030313635383037343639 --AND (A.LOAN_BAL > 0 AND A.THEO_LOAN_BAL > 0 )

con:configuration.outfile: O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/5.SQLData_TransferBefore.xlsx
O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/5.TransferResults.xlsx

con:config.con:query: SELECT TOP 100 DBO.GETCIFWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(A.CUSTOMER_NO,8)) AS 'CUSTOMER', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(A.KEY_1,9)) AS 'AF ACCT', A.LOAN_BAL AS 'AF BAL', A.THEO_LOAN_BAL AS 'AF THEO BAL', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(B.KEY_1,9)) AS 'SAV ACCT', B.CURR_BAL AS 'SAV BAL', DBO.GETACCOUNTWITHCHECKDIGIT(RIGHT(CC.KEY_1,9)) AS 'CC ACCT', CC.CURR_BAL AS 'CC BAL' FROM BORM A (NOLOCK) JOIN INVM B (NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO AND ACCT_TYPE = 0X30333030 AND CURR_STATUS = 0X3030 LEFT JOIN INVM CC (NOLOCK) ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = CC.CUSTOMER_NO AND CC.ACCT_TYPE = 0X30313031 AND CC.CURR_STATUS = 0X3030 WHERE A.ACT_TYPE = 0X36303030 -- ACCESS FACILITY ACCOUNT TYPE 6000 AND STAT = 0X3038 --08 OPEN STATUS AND RIGHT(A.KEY_1,9) = :fromAccount AND A.KEY_1 > 0X30303330303030303030313635383037343639 --AND (A.LOAN_BAL > 0 AND A.THEO_LOAN_BAL > 0 )

con:configuration.outfile: O:/UAT/Test Automation/CVS New Credit Products/Credit Product Service/TransferFromAF/5.SQLData_TransferAfter.xlsx
